headline: A Fresh Look at ServiceNow (NOW) Valuation After Recent Share Price Softness
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) shares have drifted lower in recent trading, with the stock giving up roughly 3% over the past month. Investors are weighing its long-term growth potential in the software sector. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. Despite some recent softness, ServiceNow’s longer-term story remains impressive. The stock has given back nearly 18% in year-to-date share price terms, reflecting some shifting sentiment after its lengthy outperformance. However, its three-year total...
